text:
GDM mother diet is~50%-60% calories from carbohydrate, 10-
20% from protein, and 25-30% from fat.
 ∙ The distribution of calories, particularly carbohydrates, makes a difference in the postprandial blood 
sugars. The total intake of carbohydrates should be controlled and monitored and carbohydrate foods with 
a lower glycaemic index should be emphasised.
